text:
posting here:
I'm converting a content_search to the search template. I'm actually using the default search modules to give it a try, but "/_hcms/search?&term=sample" finds nothing.
Here the dev portal
<http://blog-template-dev-4665766-4665766.hs-sites.com/search?term=sample>
Hi Luca, search results should include “relevant” content. Do you have a link to a page that you think should show up?
I think sample post is excluded from search for some reason (maybe to those who forget to delete it). I created a new post and it started working.
<@U6GNQ7JBU> are the designer docs using the new search functionality? <https://spin.d.pr/5l3y3w+>
However some of the search bars link to the knowledge base: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/search?q=test&filters=designers>
Which uses a custom search solution

ahh good to know - thinking of adding a search feature to the chrome extension to quick search the knowledge base. Figured if it was using the new HS site search I might be able to make it  “smarter” but since it’s not that’s fine I can just update the q parameter
